name: twinLight
description: when tell fortune with both Moon and Sun cards, add 1 money

name: lastSanity
description: The first time sanity goes below 0, recover it to 1

name: upright
description: when tell fortune with all cards up, add 1 refresh count today

name: down
description: when tell fortune with all cards down, add 2 money

name: balance
description: when tell fortune with no sanity change, add 1 sanity

name: rest
description: when a day over, add 1 sanity

name: Shopaholic
description: when buy anything in shop, add 1 sanity

name: abstinence
description: when not buy anything in shop, add 2 sanity

name: Enlightener
description: when satisfy all customer today, add 3 sanity

name: Insurance
description: when failed all customer today, add 3 money
